text: Weekends off? In law circles we joke you're dating your cases more than anyone else! Carefully squeezing in 'me' time amongst briefs somehow keeps me sane though!
Always reading fine print now... pesky contracts everywhere!
Ever seen "psychic self-defense" consultancy fees? Mind boggling!
Milestones don’t dictate life stages—just society’s outdated checklist mentality.

Funny how those 'inclusive' spots often have deals or events subtly coded for duos anyway. Sure feels like cities could try harder giving us solos some love without all that fine print saying "bring someone."
Hardly see "solo-friendly" spots either; cafes feel like unintended match-making arenas lol.
Northeast nooks are rare finds though; usually crowded out!
